attributes.action: Legislate blocking of call-transfere between mobile [cellular] phone masts to all but a limited list of numbers [e.g., 999]
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blocking call transfer between mobile [cellular] phone masts will by definition make it largely impossible to make & or receive calls whilst moving [including being a passenger on trains, underground].

The 'footprint' of masts, especially in 'built-up' areas, is a few square-miles at best. In many areas calls will only be possible whilst stationary.

Cutting-off calls when a mobile [cellular] phone moves from one mast to another, paired with a free automated message [e.g., 'conversation terminated with moving mobile [cellular] caller'] to all those in that call [with an SMS too [as above]], will create a near 100% compliance.

Fines will never stop everybody using a mobile [celluar] phone whilst driving, technology as described will.
